JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Norwegian speaking customer service consultant in KBH

Nordiccom in the heart of Copenhagen is a growing company and we are looking for 2 new Norwegian speaking customer service representatives for projects dealing with the Norwegian finance market. If you are interested in a part-time job, this is also possible.

Your tasks will consist primarily of customer service, sales and advising existing bank customers over the phone. The Norwegian team will consist of you and your 5 colleagues. We strive to provide the best solutions on the market and therefore we expect that you can:  

  • Speak fluent Norwegian  
  • Be focused and attentive
  • Enjoy working as a part of a team  
  • Smile through the phone and have a customer service-oriented attitude  
  • Learn and want to develop your skills in customer service and sales
  • Work independently within a specific area of responsibility 

Experience in customer service and sales is an advantage, but not a requirement.

We offer you:  

  • Personal and professional development  
  • Careful training and regular coaching  
  • A social, multinational working environment with an informal atmosphere  
  • Daily contact and communication with many different people 
  • A fixed salary with extra bonus
  • Working hours full-time from 10:00 to 18:00. (Part time is possible)
  • Remotework is possible

Who are we and what do we do?  

Nordiccom is a growing Nordic company placed in the heart of Copenhagen, Malmoe and Helsinki. The companies we represent are major banking and insurance companies in Europe. With the entire Nordic market as our workplace and the phone as our tool, we provide solutions for sales and customer service for a wide range of companies in the financial business. We ensure the quality of our products and services and comply with banks’ standards and code of conduct.

Nordiccom consists of about 90 employees divided into different teams and here you will meet Danes, Swedes, Norwegians as well as Finns. In Nordiccom we emphasize professionalism, but it is also important that we have fun when we are at work. Our goal is that our employees become skilled at their tasks and achieve good results. All training is conducted in your language.

If you are up to these new challenges together with our team, please send an application with the heading “Norwegian representative” to hr@nordiccom.dk or call +45 8877 6800 and ask for Hanne. We accept applications in both Norwegian and English.
